valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 18 Dec 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Fri 19 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low 200 miles west of Bailey 961 moving steadily east and losing its identity

Viking.text:
Wind
Southeasterly veering southwesterly, 6 to gale 8, occasionally 5 at first, perhaps severe gale 9 later.
Sea state
Rough or very rough.
Weather
Rain then squally showers.
Visibility
Good, occasionally poor.
